layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x50
  LayoutBlockFlow {test} at (0,0) size 800x50
    LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,16) size 800x18
      LayoutInline {span} at (0,0) size 166x18 [color=#008000]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 166x18
          text run at (0,0) width 166: "This line should be green."
